file_content.text: What's going on? Who are you? Why can't I see anything? If you're one of Fa'athra's goons, I swear I'll....
I'm the muscle that's saving your life.
Show some gratitude.
Shut up before Fa'athra's guards shut us both up.
Quiet!
Blast Fa'athra and his guards!
Burnok hired me to free you.
Your friend sent me.
Burnok the idiot. I told him not to stick his neck out.
Don't worry.
Get away from me! I can handle myself--if only I could see. Can't someone turn on a light?
Your sight will return soon. It's just hibernation sickness.
Calm down.
It's not the lights--you're blind, you idiot! You've got hibernation sickness.
Boy, you're dumb.
What? Hibernation sickness? Blast it. Blast it....
Just listen to me!
What? Look, I don't need to....
Forget it. Sorry. Thank you for getting me out of there. I just wasn't sure I could trust you.
I bet waking up from carbonite freeze is a little disorienting.
I don't blame you.
Yeah, well, it turns out you're alright.
Clearly, being frozen in carbonite has addled your brain.
You're nuts.
Hey, I told you I was sorry.
You don't have a choice. You're helpless.
You have to.
Well, that's true, isn't it?
Look, I came in here to find a stash Fa'athra's said to be hiding. I found the key to the stash, but soon as I grabbed it, I got froze.
Take the key and the stash as your reward for saving my life.
So what now?
Sight should come back before too long, as I understand it. I'll call my pal Burnok--he'll help me out of here.
Hard to turn down an offer like that. Thanks.
Sounds good.
It's the least you can do after I saved your skin.
You owe me that much.
I'd like to do more, but I'm kinda in a tough position right now, see.
As for me, I'll call my pal Burnok. Think I'll be safe waiting here for him to help me out.
I'll see you again soon I hope.
Later.
This "stash" better be good, or I'll know who to come looking for.
I hope this is worth it.
Legendary--and I'm not just talking 'bout credits, either.
Need assistance?
You've helped plenty.
Burnok may not look like much, but he's dependable to a fault. Besides, you seem to have cleared the place well enough.
Anyway, thanks again. Maybe I'll see you back in Jiguuna, at ol' Nem'ro's.
I got nothing to say to you now.
